title: There are \No Wake Zone\" signs on pilings in the Intracoastal Waterway near Holden Beach and Lockwood Folly Inlet. Boaters rarely slow down. Are they legitimate?  Who would be in charge of enforcement if they are in deed legit?"
text:
No Wake zones are enforced by the N.C. Wildlife Commission. They are
designated at the request of towns and counties and must be properly
marked

Here's a link with more information.



http://www.ncwildlife.org/Boating_Waterways/nwz_general.htm
